markdownRemark.excerpt: This simple blog I create using gatsby.js stater blog. To make dark mode I use gatsy dark mode. To hosting I use github pages. And to push to github and deploy…
markdownRemark.html:
This simple blog I create using gatsby.js stater blog. To make dark mode I use gatsy dark mode.

To hosting I use github pages. And to push to github and deploy I use gh-pages.

I made this website just to write simple things of what I’ve done.

~ Malik
